workshop.controllers.internal.rest

Class EmployeesRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<Employee>
      • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.EmployeesRestController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkshopRestController<Employee>

    @RestController
 @RequestMapping(path="/internal/employees",
                produces="application/hal+json;charset=UTF-8")
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=Employee.class)
public class EmployeesRestController
extends WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<Employee>

      • postPhone

        @PostMapping(path="/{id}/phones",
             consumes={"application/json;charset=UTF-8","multipart/form-data"})
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Employee\', \'put\') and hasPermission(\'Phone\', \'post\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> postPhone(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    @Validated(value=Persist.class) @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Phone phone,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Creates a new Phone and set it to the existing Employee.
        Parameters:
        id - Employee.ID to set the new Phone to.
        phone - A new Phone to be created and set to existing Employee
        Returns:
        Persisted Phone as a Resource.

      • putPhone

        @PutMapping(path="/{id}/phones",
            consumes={"application/json;charset=UTF-8","multipart/form-data"})
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Employee\', \'put\') and hasPermission(\'Phone\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> putPhone(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @Validated(value=Merge.class) @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Phone phone,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Parameters:
        id - Employee.ID
        phone - New or existing Phone to bind with existing Employee
        Returns:
        Updated Phone with the given Employee set.

      • deletePositionForbidden

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}/position/{positionId}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Employee\', \'put\') and hasPermission(\'Position\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deletePositionForbidden(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    @PathVariable(name="positionId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.Long positionId)
        Wont delete the Position. Instead this method will return HttpStatus.FORBIDDEN and the message with the Link to the Position itself.
        Parameters:
        id - Employee.ID
        positionId - Self-description.
        Returns:
        HttpStatus.FORBIDDEN and the message with the Position as a Resource with the Link to it.

        @RequestMapping(path="/{id}/tasks-modified-by/{taskId}",
                method={POST,PUT,DELETE},
                consumes={"application/json;charset=UTF-8","multipart/form-data"})
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Task\', \'put\') or hasPermission(\'Task\', \'post\') or hasPermission(\'Task\', \'delete\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> notAllowedTaskModifiedBy(@PathVariable(name="id")

        Returns:

        @PostMapping(path="/{id}/tasks-created-by",
             consumes={"application/json;charset=UTF-8","multipart/form-data"})
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Task\', \'post\')")

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Task task,

        Receives a new Task, persist it and sets as 'createdBy' a given Employee.

      • putTaskCreatedBy

        @PutMapping(path="/{id}/tasks-created-by",
            consumes={"application/json;charset=UTF-8","multipart/form-data"})
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Task\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> putTaskCreatedBy(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        @Validated(value=Merge.class) @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Task task,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Receives an existing Task and updates it with the given Employee as 'createdBy'.
        Returns:

      • deleteTaskCreatedBy

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}/tasks-created-by/{taskId}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Employee\', \'put\') and hasPermission(\'Task\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deleteTaskCreatedBy(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @PathVariable(name="taskId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Long taskId)
        Just deletes the 'createdBy' property from a given Task
        Parameters:
        id - Employee id to be deleted from Task's 'createdBy' property.
        taskId - The Task that needs the deletion of 'createdBy' property.
        Returns:
        The renewed Task without 'createdBy'.

        Receives a new Order, persist it and sets as 'createdBy' a given Employee.
        Returns:
        Created Order with the 'createdBy' set.

      • putOrderCreatedBy

        @PutMapping(path="/{id}/orders-created-by",
            consumes={"application/json;charset=UTF-8","multipart/form-data"})
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Order\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> putOrderCreatedBy(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           @Validated(value=Merge.class) @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Order order,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Receives an existing Order and updates it with the given Employee as 'createdBy'.
        Returns:
        An updated Order with the new 'createdBy'.

      • deleteOrderCreatedBy

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}/orders-created-by/{orderId}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Order\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deleteOrderCreatedBy(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                           @PathVariable(name="orderId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.Long orderId)
        Just deletes the 'createdBy' property from a given Order
        Parameters:
        id - Employee id to be deleted from Order's 'createdBy' property.
        orderId - The Order that needs the deletion of 'createdBy' property.
        Returns:
        The renewed Order without 'createdBy'.
